name: Attuned_Dominating_Grasp_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to create a Fiery Orb which will damage and disorient enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 1 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Dominators and may be slotted into most control powers.
power_display_names: Dominating Grasp: Recharge/Chance for Fiery Orb (Dominator)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Fiery Orb
